title: Mick Cleary's verdict: England rout proves they have nerve, the belief and the weaponry for Rugby World Cup bid
text:
The dream is alive, the World Cup mission has lift-off and the promised land is within reach as England contemplate their first semi-final in 12 years. This was a keenly-edged defining moment for this England team, a sure sign that they have the nerve, the belief and the weaponry to make a serious bid for honours. England had the cojones and they had the class, knowing that there was a pit of dread awaiting if they were to lose but they did not blink, they did not hesitate. It was a contest that became a rout. It was the perfect time to deliver a performance of note. The demons of 2015 have been well and truly banished.

A loss would have been a calamity of the highest order, the ruination of...
description: The dream is alive, the World Cup mission has lift-off and the promised land is within reach as England contemplate their first semi-final in 12 years.
